attributes.action: Make olympics equal opportunities,the olympics and Paralympics should be as one
attributes.additional_details:
Why should paralympians have to wait and perform after olympians? Surely the correct way for this is to have all games played together so all get the same coverage!
We try to intergrate people of all anilities in to so iety and schools and institutions are slammed if they dont, so why is it ok to make Paralympians wait and be last?!
attributes.background:
I find it unfair and totally unacceptable that the Paralympic games are played after the Olympics, the games should run all together with olympic games and Paralympic games on the same days
It seems too segregated and should not be allowed

rejection.details: The organisation of the Olympic and Paralympic Games are matters for the International Olympic Committee and the International Paralympic Committee.
